Blog.post: Today I have mourned the death of our 40th President, Ronald Reagan. He was someone I admired for the way he conducted his life and the respect he gave others. I have watched the funeral in California tonight on my TV and I must say I was quite moved. Our military is just awe inspiring in the amount of respect they are able to give to someone. The attention to detail and reverence they show are truly noteworthy. I watched with tears in my eyes as they fired canons 21 times, gave a 21 gun salute with rifles, flew the missing man tribute flyover, folded the flag from his casket and gave it to Nancy. Very, very moving. Also something I found so awesome was the way our soldiers kept the casket completely level at all times even while moving up and down stairs. Our military is the BEST!!! They make me so proud to be an American!! God Bless Ronald Reagan and God Bless America!
